content.short: A cryptocurrency wallet and gateway to blockchain apps.
content.description: MetaMask is a non-custodial cryptocurrency wallet that operates as a browser extension and mobile app. It allows users to store, send, and receive Ethereum and EVM-compatible tokens, and interact with decentralized applications (dApps) directly from their web browser. MetaMask serves as a crucial gateway to the decentralized web, providing secure key management and transaction signing capabilities.
content.meta: Manage your crypto, interact with dApps, and explore Web3 with MetaMask, the leading self-custodial wallet.
